task_description: **Financial Advisor (FA):** Hello! I'm your advisor, here to assist you with your financial goals.**Individual (I):** Hi! I'm interested in paying off student loans and looking for Global Real Estate Fund. I consider myself moderate in terms of risk, and I have $$500,000 to allocate.**FA:** Absolutely... Any other requirement ?**I:** hmmm, yes, I am looking for something that is easy for beginners with minimum financial knowledge.**FA:** That aligns well with your long-term goals.
